info.name: Inbox compact
info.description: gives you more vertical space in Google's Inbox
info.additionalInfo: list item spacing can be negative (because Inbox has other style rules that also affect the spacing between list items). title (& action) bar padding only applies when you're scrolling down an email and the bar is fixed to the top of the screen. changelog: 2018-11-04: fix list item spacing for website code changes 2018-06-11: remove extra space at end of emails and at top of reply bar, fix floating reply bar again for website code changes 2016-12-18: compact list items, compact bundle filter list (was previously in a separate userstyle), add settings, fix floating reply bar

options.label: compact
compact
